DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Diamyd ( rhGAD65 formulate alum ) effective preserve body 's insulin produce capacity patient recently diagnose type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase III Study Investigate Impact Diamyd Patients Newly Diagnosed With Type 1 Diabetes ( EU )
DOC.criteria: Main Male female patient 10 20 year age Insulin dependent type 1 diabetes mellitus diagnose within previous 3 month time screen Fasting Cpeptide level time screen 0.1 nmol/L Elevated GAD65 antibody ( GADA ) time screen Main Treatment immunosuppressant antidiabetic medication insulin A history certain disease condition ( e.g . anemia , HIV , hepatitis , epilepsy , head trauma , neurological disease cerebrovascular accident , alcohol drug abuse etc ) Treatment vaccine within 1 month prior plan first Diamyd dose plan treatment vaccine 2 month last injection Diamyd , exclude influenza vaccine Participation clinical trial new chemical entity within previous 3 month Pregnancy plan pregnancy within 1 year last Diamyd dose Presence associate serious disease condition opinion investigator make patient noneligible study
